name: Adult Mithral Dragon
description: The Adult Mithral Dragon is a large, majestic dragon known for its shiny mithral scales that reflect light beautifully. With a sleek, streamlined body, it possesses sharp claws and a long, powerful tail, capable of delivering devastating attacks.
memorable: This dragon's unique Mithral Scales ability allows it to reflect spells back at casters, showcasing its magical prowess beyond physical might.
goals: The dragon may act as a guardian of treasures or ancient wisdom, seeking to outsmart enemies and protect its domain.
relations: Typically associated with other dragons or magical creatures, it may also coexist with wise beings or serve as an ally to powerful spellcasters.
environment: Prefers lofty mountainous regions or ancient ruins, often where its shimmering scales can be hidden or revealed by the sun.
strengths: Exceptional agility due to high Dexterity, combined with powerful magical defenses like Legendary Resistance and Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Average Strength score, relying more on cunning and magical abilities than brute force in combat.
attacks: Engages enemies with a mix of powerful Bite and Claw attacks, along with a frightening presence that can instill fear.
most_powerful_ability: Shard Breath, an area-effect attack dealing slashing damage while creating difficult terrain.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 26 indicate sharp awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Impressive proficiency in Perception and Stealth, making it adept at avoiding detection.
additional_information: Can communicate telepathically up to 120 feet.
Possesses legendary actions to control the battlefield effectively.
Immunity to slashing damage enhances its durability against physical attacks.
Ability to end magical effects on targets through its Bite attack.
Ability to inflict continual damage through its Claw attack.
